alert.note: Alert for Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 25 at 2:53AM CDT until June 25 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Minnesota, including the following county, Clearwater. * WHEN...Until 900 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 250 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated continued rain due to showers and thunderstorms. In addition to heavy rain that fell Saturday evening. - This advisory replaces the flash flood warnings that were in effect for Clearwater County. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bagley, Rice Lake, western Upper Rice Lake and Lower Rice Lake.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
